## Snowflake Python Connector {background-image="bg/wb3.png"}

- Wire protocol is Arrow IPC-based, but is more like an Arrow representation of the Snowflake internal representation
- Needs compute functions to export Pandas, Arrow, Python objects (dbapi)
- Used Arrow C++, which resulted in a pinned pyarrow version dependency

```python
import snowflake.connector

con = snowflake.connector.connect(...)
cur = con.cursor()
cur.execute("SELECT * FROM testtable")
cur.fetchall().to_arrow()
```
